  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String toUserId, java.lang.String message) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Send a message
      Parameters:
      userId - the user sending the message
      toUserId - the user receiving the message
      message - the message
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if one of the users don't exist
      AuthorizationException - if not allowed to send the message

    • reportUser

      public boolean reportUser​(java.lang.String fromUserId, java.lang.String toUserId, java.lang.String message) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Reporting a user
      Parameters:
      fromUserId - the user that sent the report
      toUserId - user being reported
      message - what the report is about
      Returns:
      whether or not the report successfully went through
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - user wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - report is invalid
